contents.text: Welcome to Proteus Digital Health, pioneering the Digital Medicines revolution for Healthcare for Everyone, Everywhere.
For career opportunities in engineering, science, design, or clinical roles, press 1.
To explore current job openings and internships, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our careers team.

navigationGoals: Browse current engineering and internship job openings
I’m transitioning from the military and want information on current engineering or clinical internship opportunities.
I’d like to browse your current engineering and design internships and job openings in digital medicine R&D.
I need to find out what internships and job openings are available
I'd like to review current internship openings in digital medicine research.

contents.text: To check the status of an application you've submitted, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your application status.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my submitted job application
I submitted an application for a veteran recruitment position and need an update on its status.
I need an update on the status of my application for the software engineering role I submitted.
I’m calling to get an update on the job application I submitted
I want to check the status of my engineering internship application.

contents.text: For product support and inquiries about our digital medicine solutions, press 2.
For technical assistance with your digital health platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with technical support.

navigationGoals: Get technical support for my Proteus digital health platform
I’m having trouble logging into the Proteus digital health platform and need technical assistance.
I’m experiencing API integration errors with your digital health platform and need technical support.
I need help troubleshooting my digital health platform
I need help troubleshooting my digital health sensor connection.

contents.text: To speak with our clinical specialists about medical inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our clinical team.

navigationGoals: Speak with a clinical specialist about my digital medicine therapy
I have questions about using the digital medicine patch and want to speak with a clinical specialist.
I want to discuss my medication adherence analytics and clinical implications with a specialist.
I’d like to talk to a clinician about my medication monitoring results
I have medical questions about the data metrics from the digital medicine sensor.
